function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in construction sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supply chain issues causing delays in obtaining necessary materials","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operational restrictions impacting workforce productivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines and protocols for handling covid-19 cases within the construction industry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate awareness and compliance with covid-19 safety measures among construction workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extended delays in receiving materials and products from suppliers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workforce reductions through furloughs, layoffs, and terminations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived long-term viability concerns for organizations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial decrease in commercial water use, commuter traffic, and airport activity leading to lower revenues for infrastructure projects.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharp decrease in transportation revenues and decline in gas tax receipts.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential permanent decline in the appeal of public transportation and shared ride modes due to fear of infections.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 in the construction industry due to lack of guidelines and best practices.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of research on the consequences of covid-19 on the us construction industry.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Absence of exploration of new construction-related research areas or streams due to covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reviewing industry guidelines and best practices from various organizations may lead to inconsistent or conflicting information.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forced remote work due to the pandemic may lead to negative psychological impacts on construction industry participants.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive force majeure clauses in construction contracts may lead to uncertainty in dealing with the impacts of the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines and recommendations from well-established organizations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement and oversight in implementing safety standards","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate training and education on best practices for disease prevention in construction jobsites","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workplace safety inspections are shown to reduce injury rates and costs, but the impact of osha guidelines on covid-19 exposure risk is not specified.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly changing guidance from major agencies like cdc and osha may lead to confusion and implementation errors.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to safety steps before shifts start","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of job site hygiene","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing at the job site","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through construction sites due to lack of adherence to guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness about best practices in dealing with the pandemic in the construction industry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on external organizations for the development of best practices and guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personal hygiene practices on jobsite","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures on jobsite","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of management of sick employees","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stacking of workforce trades","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclean surfaces of service and fleet vehicles","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Management of sick employees","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Companies not implementing or updating policies to follow cdc, osha, and local guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of worker training to prevent disease spread in geographic areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to screen calls for possible exposures and circumstances before worker entry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sick leave policies may not be flexible and consistent with public health guidance, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases in the construction industry.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication with firms that provide contract or temporary workers about the importance of sick employees staying home, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider the concerns of workers related to pay, leave, safety, and health, leading to lower compliance with health and safety guidelines and increased risk of contagion.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information provided to workers and customers about medical care in the event of a covid-19 outbreak, leading to potential confusion and lack of preparedness.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tasks with high exposure risk to covid-19 may not be properly identified and managed, leading to potential exposure and spread of the disease among construction workers.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High exposure risks in construction activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of plans to deal with covid-19 in construction jobsites","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Growth of construction sector in boston","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 prevention measures on construction sites","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forceful stop-work orders impacting construction projects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited coordination of site
